00025 #include <boost/thread/mutex.hpp>
00026 
00027 namespace Hypertable {
00028 
00029   class MemoryTracker {
00030   public:
00031     MemoryTracker() : m_memory_used(0) { return; }
00032 
00033     void add(int64_t amount) {
00034       ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00035       m_memory_used += amount;
00036     }
00037 
00038     void subtract(int64_t amount) {
00039       ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00040       m_memory_used -= amount;
00041     }
00042 
00043     int64_t balance() {
00044       ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00045       return m_memory_used;
00046     }
00047 
00048   private:
00049     Mutex m_mutex;
00050     int64_t m_memory_used;
00051   };
